query: SELECT o.hn, o.vn, o.an, o.vstdate AS visit_date, o.vsttime AS visit_time, sp.NAME AS main_department, k.department AS sub_department, o.pttype AS pttype, o.diag_text AS diagnosis_text FROM ovst AS o JOIN spclty AS sp ON sp.spclty = o.spclty JOIN kskdepartment AS k ON k.depcode = o.main_dep WHERE o.vn in (#vn)
